name: Cup Off-road Monster 3D
description:
Experience cutting edge graphics, ground breaking physics, amazing cars and adrenaline-filled excitement in Cup Off-road Monster 3D!
Use your best skills to beat the most mind blowing tracks in this physics based racing game and be the ultimate Offroad Driver!
Features:
• More detailed and complex graphics and physics than ever
• Controller support
• Playground for kids (No damage, easy tracks)
• Monster trucks, Desert trucks, 4x4 offroaders, Oldtimers!
• Real World car sounds
